title: STAT+: Unfilled vacancies have depleted NIH advisory councils, key players in grant approvals
description: Only one new member was added to NIH advisory councils, which make final recommendations on grant awards, during President Trump's first year
content: Only one new member was added to NIH advisory councils, which make final recommendations on grant awards, during President Trump's first year
